item.title: March 2nd, 1943
item.description: It’s March 2nd, 1943. The user asks your software to schedule a meeting with Acmecorp at “9 AM on the first Monday of next month”. [6:17:45] homura ~ $ cal -3 2 March 1943 February 1943 March 1943 April 1943 Su Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa Su Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa Su Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa 1 2 3 4 5 6 1 2 3 4 5 6 1 2 3 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 14 15 16 17 18 19 20 14 15 16 17 18 19 20 11 12 13 14 15 16 17 21 22 23 24 25 26 27 21 22 23 24 25 26 27 18 19 20 21 22 23 24 28 28 29 30 31 25 26 27 28 29 30 Right now, California is on Pacific Standard Time (PST) and Arizona is on Mountain Standard Time (MST).
